text: HRdy 77rty TTTHrf qifearut 3H9 / Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 4T ({84 4da- ak{THTf HAT4) W48 Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) vft-5 & 6, dar-10 , ERoT, 7 ferit-110075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 NHAII Policy Guidelines/ Land Acquisition/ 2019 No. 7.1.64/2019 dated the { December,2019 [Decision taken on File No. NHAI/LA/Policy(Misc. )/2019] Sub.: Optimization of Planning & Execution of Projects Approval of LA cases by LA Committee' Refer Policy Guidelines No. 7.1.61/2019 dated 23 Oct 2019 (copy enclosed at Annex-A) vide which it is mandated that a Committee under the chairmanship of Chairman, NHAI with Member (Admn) and concerned Member as members would examine all new proposals for construction and development of National Highways as per viability of the project and also approve the alignment. The procedure is applicable for all LA cases where land acquisition has not started or land acquisition has reached only 34 stage   including balance   acquisition activities for viable projects where 3D has reached only for some part of the required land. 2_ For consideration of the proposals by LA Committee, an LAC Portal had been  developed by LA Division with the help of IT Division. User Manual in respect LAC Portal is enclosed at Annex-B. All Technical Divisions are requested to go through the User Manual and submit proposals accordingly for consideration by LA Committee through portal. 3_ The procedure for processing the proposals is as under: After duly examining the proposal received from field offices, concerned Technical Division at HQ shall submit the same on LAC Portal. All fields marked with are compulsory. The proposals shall contain detailed alignment maps. (ii) LA Division shall compile the proposals and submit the same to LA Committee (iii) The proposal shall be presented to the committee by respective CGM GM; The decision of LA Committee shall be noted by LA Division. (T R M NHAI
